sentences.en: a work of art by a true master
sentences.cn: 一件真正的大师之作

sentences.en: He had interfaced all this machinery with a master computer.
sentences.cn: 他把所有机器连接到了一台主计算机上。

sentences.en: He is a master of the pun and the double entendre.
sentences.cn: 他出口就是俏皮话，说话下流不带脏字。

sentences.en: He took a master's degree in economics at Yale.
sentences.cn: 他选择了攻读耶鲁大学的经济学硕士学位。

sentences.en: He was a past-master at manipulating the media for his own ends.
sentences.cn: 他是操纵媒体为自己服务的老手。

sentences.en: I fell under the influence of a history master.
sentences.cn: 我当时深受一位历史老师的影响。

sentences.en: I never quite mastered the art of walking in high heels.
sentences.cn: 我一直学不会穿高跟鞋走路。

sentences.en: I've a master's in economics.
sentences.cn: 我获得了经济学硕士学位。

sentences.en: Jackson remained calm and always master of his passions.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊镇定自若，始终克制着情绪。

sentences.en: Kim opted for cooler blues and yellows in the master bedroom.
sentences.cn: 金为主卧室挑选了偏冷色调的蓝色和黄色。

sentences.en: Master of Arts/Science/Education etc
sentences.cn: 文学/理学/教育学等硕士

sentences.en: Mr Palmer was a retired maths master.
sentences.cn: 帕尔默先生是一名退休的数学教师。

sentences.en: My master ordered me not to deliver the message except in private.
sentences.cn: 我的主人命令我务必私下里传递消息。

sentences.en: Nice to see you, Master Simon.
sentences.cn: 很高兴见到您，西蒙少爷。

sentences.en: Paul Mazursky was Master of Ceremonies, and he was pretty hysterical.
sentences.cn: 保罗·马祖尔斯基担任司仪，他简直把人笑坏了。

sentences.en: The master bedroom has its own en suite bathroom.
sentences.cn: 主卧室带有独立卫生间。

sentences.en: the master control center at NASA
sentences.cn: 美国航空航天局的总控制中心

sentences.en: The period of maturation is determined by the cellar master.
sentences.cn: 酿熟期的长短由地窖的主人决定。

sentences.en: the skills needed to master a new language
sentences.cn: 掌握一门新语言所需的技能

sentences.en: When his master's off traveling, Caleb stays with Pierre's parents.
sentences.cn: 凯莱布在主人外出旅行时与皮埃尔的父母住在一起。

sentences.en: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.cn: 你得去请求主人的同意。

sentences.en: You’ll have to ask the master’s permission.
sentences.cn: 你得去请求主人的同意。

words.tran_cn: 专横的，傲慢的；主人派头的；熟练的
无主的；无内容的；无主人控制的
好支配人地；技巧熟练地
掌握；精通；优势；征服；统治权

phrases.tran_cn: 能自制，能控制自己的感情
万能钥匙，难题解决法；总电键
主要图表， 综合图表；设计任务书；主要作业表

trans.tran_cn: 熟练的，最重要的，原始拷贝的
主人，专家，能手，男教师，（已故）艺术大师，船长，硕士学位，母带，院长，长老，少爷
trans.tran_en: someone who is very skilled at something
to learn a skill or a language so well that you have no difficulty with it
to learn a skill or a language so well that you have no difficulty with it
